Text: Not PS3-ready,as there are Mkvfiles in there.You'll need to do a few tweaks to play files like that on the ps3;)

episode 1-53 are mkv 
episode 54-259 are all mp4 

If you want to play mkv download ps3mediaserver and you are good to go
Warning! In some episodes the translator has put text containing MAJOR SPOILERS just after the intro song is played. This ruined some episodes for me.
